content:
- 2 -
7. Assorted buses and trucks - requested by Matsu Hsien Government to open transportation facilities on Nankang and Peikang Islands in Matsu. CUSA already has this request.
All of the above activities have either been aid initiated or will receive at least, Title II assistance. It is understood that a large quantity of vehicles and equipment are now being declared excess here in Taiwan which could service some of the above requirements. It is hoped that the groups having needs for this excess equipment here in Taiwan will contact CUSA directly to process their requests and that ways can be found to help them get the items they so urgently require, I can guarantee that the above groups can utilize quickly and efficiently any excess properties they receive.

All of the above activities have either been aid initiated or will receive at least, Title II assistance. It is understood that a large quantity of vehicles and equipment are now being declared excess here in Taiwan which could service some of the above requirements. It is hoped that the groups having needs for this excess equipment here in Taiwan will contact CUSA directly to process their requests and that ways can be found to help them get the items they so urgently require, I can guarantee that the above groups can utilize quickly and efficiently any excess properties they receive.
